title: The Top 10 QBs for the 2022 Season
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss the NFL’s top 10 Quarterbacks for the 2022 season, if Aaron Rodgers plays it too safe and Tyreek Hill saying this is Tua’s last year to show what he’s got. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Tyreek Hill comments on Tua and does Aaron Rodgers play it too safe?
